channel.title: Lmao how stupid can hotmail get?
channel.description:
So I click "Forgot your Password?" I enter my Hotmail ACC, and then It says the most stupidest thing!
Reset your password Send password reset instructions to me in e-mail Instructions will be sent to: gooarm@hotmail.com
And then i click continue:
Password reset instructions sent Password reset instructions were sent to: gooarm@hotmail.com. If you don't see the e-mail message in your inbox, look for it in your junk mail folder or check your e-mail again later.
HOW SHOULD I SEE THE EMAIL IF I DONT EVEN KNOW MY PASSWORD??

item.title: Lmao how stupid can hotmail get?
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:21, topic:182582”]you shoulda set recovery answers…

Yahoo FTW!!![/quote]
I DID!

item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

is there any way I can find out?

item.title: Lmao how stupid can hotmail get?
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:18, topic:182582”][quote author=Carazon ™ link=topic=244226.msg2067056#msg2067056 date=1203517290]
Well. I had to restart my Computer, so I can’t have the Password saved on MSN, and I can’t have it on Firefox cookies. =/ And, I registered thios MSN 2 years ago, I can’t remember the alternative email.

And really, its not my fault.

Also, what about the secret question? Im not so dumb. Why can’t they just ask the question?
[/quote]
It is your fault because put the alternative email as the one you was signing up for all those years ago.[/quote]

AND WHAT IF IT WAS MY ONLY EMAIL ADRESS?? BESIDES, the alternative email wasnt required!

Read full topic
item.source: Lmao how stupid can hotmail get?

@Carazon wrote:

So I click “Forgot your Password?”

I enter my Hotmail ACC, and then It says the most stupidest thing!

Reset your password

Send password reset instructions to me in e-mail
Instructions will be sent to:
gooarm@hotmail.com

And then i click continue:

Password reset instructions sent

Password reset instructions were sent to: gooarm@hotmail.com.
If you don’t see the e-mail message in your inbox, look for it in your junk mail folder or check your e-mail again later.

HOW SHOULD I SEE THE EMAIL IF I DONT EVEN KNOW MY PASSWORD??
